annocheck.message: annocheck 'hardened' test passes for /usr/bin/cronnext on x86_64
annocheck.details:

Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: info: Notes produced by gcc plugin version 9.21

Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: warn: Could not find separate debug file: cronnext-1.5.2-4.el8.x86_64.debug.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: No gaps found.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: Test for -Wl,-z-now.  (Dynamic segment present, but no dynamic relocations found).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: Branch protection.  (Not an AArch64 binary).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with -fcf-protection.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: One dynamic section/segment found.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: Test of dynamic tags.  (AArch64 specific).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Entry point instruction is ENDBR.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with -D_GLIBCXX_ASSERTIONS.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: Test for -Wl,-z,relro.  (No dynamic relocations).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Stack not executable.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: The LTO setting was not recorded (probably due to the use of an old version of the annobin plugin).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with sufficient optimization.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with PIC/PIE.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled as a position independent binary.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Good GNU Property note.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: DT_RPATH/DT_RUNPATH absent or rooted at /usr.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: No RWX segments found.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Consistent use of the -fshort-enum option.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with -fstack-clash-protection.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with sufficient stack protection.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: skip: Test for stack realignment support.  (Only needed on i686 binaries).
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: No text relocations found.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: No thread cancellation problems.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: Compiled with either -Wall and/or -Wformat-security.
Hardened: /usr/bin/cronnext: PASS: GOT/PLT relocations are read only.

permissions.message: /usr/bin/crontab in cronie on x86_64 carries insecure mode 4755, Security Team review may be required

path-migration.message: File /lib/systemd/system/crond.service found should be in /usr/lib on x86_64
path-migration.remedy: Files should not be installed in old directory names.  Modify the package to install the affected file to the preferred directory.
